item.description:
We are going to Zip through the trees!!

We will meet in front the gift shop at 8:30 am. The extra time will give people time to fill out any necessary paperwork. Please call Zoar directly to book and pay for your trip. Just let them know that you are part of THE FUN SINGLES group when calling.

The basic details are as follows, please refer to the website for more specific information.

http://www.deerfieldz...

The 3 hour adventure will have you zipping through the trees. Price does NOT include taxes or any additional fees. cancellation insurance is also available. Price is $85.00 + plus any taxes and fees.

They can only have 8 people per group, but please don't let that stop you from tring it. We can have as many groups as needed.

Space is limited, so please call and book your reservation ASAP.

Hope to see you all in the trees!!

Ivone

PS - We are also doing their White water adventure on Saturday, Sept 12th. Please refer to the White Water Rafting meet-up for details.

As Promised - Please refer to the Camping Weekend meet-up for camping details.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in front of the gift shop.
item.name: Zip Line adventure
